bibl.title: Gospel Fragments. (Oxford Early Christian Gospel Texts. 2.)
bibl.note: I. Fragments of Apocryphal Gospel Manuscripts (Th.J.Kr.). - II. Gospel Fragments: The 'Unknown Gospel' on Papyrus Egerton 2 (+ Papyrus Cologne 255) [P. Egerton 2 + P. Köln VI, 255 (= van Haelst 586; LDAB 4736)] (T.N.). - III. Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 840 [P. Oxy. V, 840 (= van Haelst 585; LDAB 5831)] (M.J.Kr.). - IV. Other Gospel Fragments (Th.J.Kr.). - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: KRAUS Thomas J., Michael J. KRUGER and Tobias NICKLAS (Edited by), Gospel Fragments. (Oxford Early Christian Gospel Texts. 2.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2009, 8°, xx-304 pp., 15 pll. ISBN 978-0-19-920815-9. £87.
